First, we need to clean up the dataset a bit.
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

airbnb = read.csv("airbnb.csv")
str(airbnb)
# Setting descriptions, URLS, to character types
airbnb_char = airbnb %>% mutate_at(c(2:12, 14, 18, 25), as.character)

# Setting dates to date types
library(lubridate)
```
